unnormalised: Entertainment: Is Ranbir Kapoor secretly dating Isha Ambani's cousin?!
normalised: Entertainment: Is Ranbir Kapoor secretly dating Isha Ambani's cousin?!

unnormalised: Bollywood is buzzing! Sources say Ranbir Kapoor was spotted leaving Antilia at 03:00 hrs on 20/07/2024, sparking rumours he's seeing Anjali Kothari, Mukesh Ambani’s niece. Eyewitnesses claim he was trying to be discreet, wearing a simple kurta pajama – quite unlike his usual designer duds.
normalised: Bollywood is buzzing! Sources say Ranbir Kapoor was spotted leaving Antilia at three hundred hours on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four, sparking rumours he's seeing Anjali Kothari, Mukesh Ambani's niece. Eyewitnesses claim he was trying to be discreet, wearing a simple kurta pajama – quite unlike his usual designer duds.

unnormalised: This comes just weeks after Alia Bhatt's cryptic Instagram post hinting at "big changes coming." Could this be it? Remember that awkward Karan Johar Diwali party where Alia avoided Ranbir like the plague? Hmmm...
normalised: This comes just weeks after Alia Bhatt's cryptic Instagram post hinting at "big changes coming." Could this be it? Remember that awkward Karan Johar Diwali party where Alia avoided Ranbir like the plague? Hmmm...

unnormalised: Anjali, a known philanthropist and art collector, was last linked to a London-based businessman in 2023. Neither Ranbir nor the Ambani family have commented. But whispers in Pali Hill suggest their families have known each other for ages. Maybe a matchmaking situation orchestrated by Kokilaben herself? We'll keep you updated as the garam chai cools! Stay tuned at 6 PM, 21/07/2024 for more! And don't forget, Filmfare awards are on 22/07/2024! Maybe they'll make their debut there?
